org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowViewGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowView
      • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowViewGroup
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShadowAbsoluteLayout, ShadowAdapterView, ShadowDrawerLayout, ShadowFrameLayout, ShadowLinearLayout, ShadowMapView, ShadowRelativeLayout

    Shadow for ViewGroup that simulates its implementation
